allEvents.name: BrusselsTogether Meetup 2
allEvents.description:
Hey Brussels people,

After a very fruitful first event in the heart of Brussels, we are back with some crunchy new projects!

\#BrusselsTogether events allow people to discover citizen initiatives, while offering the opportunity to the audience to share their ideas and get support from the community. See more on our website http://brusselstogether.org/

Events always take place in very cool and innovative places.

\#BrusselsTogether is also a growing community of transparent and inclusive projects, for which everyone can contribute! https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether

Schedule 

7 pm - Doors open, onigiris, gyozas & local beers üçôüçúüçª

7:30 pm - Introduction to #BrusselsTogether

7:40 pm - Civic innovation network - Designing a new civic model to foster collaborations between citizens

7:55 pm - D√©clic en Perspectives - En route to social entrepreneurship 

8:10 pm - Brass'Art Digitaal Caf√© - The first artistic and digital brewery in Molenbeek

8:30 pm - How do YOU make Brussels better 
Pitch your idea in 60 seconds or less

*Registration*

We suggest a donation of ‚Ç¨10 for the organization of the event. Profit will go to the 3 projects.

tiers.description: Contribute ‚Ç¨10 and get a high five at the event! ‚úã

allEvents.name: BrusselsTogether Meetup 3
allEvents.description:
Hello Brussels!

According to the UN, by 2050 66% of the world‚Äôs population will be urban dwellers, which will profoundly affect the role of modern city-states on Earth.

Today, citizens are already anticipating this futurist trend by creating numerous initiatives inside their local communities and outside of politics.

If you want to be part of the change, please come have a look to our monthly events! You will have the opportunity to meet real actors of change and question them about their purpose. 

We also offer the opportunity for anyone interested to come before the audience and share their ideas in 60 seconds at the end of the event.

See more about #BrusselsTogether radical way of thinking below.

https://brusselstogether.org/

Get your ticket below and get a free drink thanks to our sponsor! üçªüéâ

**Schedule**

7 pm - Doors open

7:30 pm - Introduction to #BrusselsTogether

7:40 pm - Co-Labs, Citizen Lab of Social Innovations

7:55 pm - BeCode.org, growing today‚Äôs talented youth into tomorrow‚Äôs best developers.

8:10 pm - OURB, A city building network

8:30 pm - How do YOU make Brussels better 
Pitch your idea in 60 seconds or less

tiers.description: Sponsor the drinks. Pretty sure everyone will love you.

allEvents.name: BrusselsTogether Meetup 6
allEvents.description:
BrusselsTogether is delighted to invite you to its 6th Meetup of the year.

For this edition, get ready to learn on the topic of sustainable food. Exchange with great associations working in this field and taste delicious local food!

#BrusselsTogether organizes monthly meetups on the first Wednesday of the month to celebrate bottom-up initiatives that make Brussels a better city to live and work. Join the community https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether

**Agenda & Speakers:**

7.00 pm - Doors open

7.30 pm - Presentation of #BrusselsTogether

7.40 pm - G√©ry Brusselmans, contributor of Tartine et Boterham

7.50 pm - Seb Dp, contributor of FruitCollect

8.00 pm - Tom Gendry, contributor of Co-oking

8.10 pm - TBA

allEvents.name: BrusselsTogether Meetup 4
allEvents.description:
Hello Brussels üëã

#BrusselsTogether is growing everyday with tons of new people and ideas to renovate our dear city!

There are now 9 projects on [#BrusselsTogether](https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether). Although they operate in different areas (civic innovation, urbanism, social inclusiveness), they all share the same purpose: rebuild the city from the bottom-up. 

The next meetup will take place at the all-new BeCentral, a grass-roots initiative aiming to boost Belgium as a digital front-runner. 

Join us to discover 3 ambitious projects happening in Brussels.

Schedule: 

7 pm - Doors open 

7:30 pm - Introduction to #brusselstogether

7:40 pm - [Share Food](https://www.facebook.com/sharefoodbrussels/) - Sharing instead of wasting

7:55 pm - [Communa ASBL](https://www.facebook.com/asblCommuna/) - Turning empty buildings into socio-cultural centers 

8:10 pm - [Veganizer](https://qpayee.com/veganizerbxl) - Let's make Brussels more Vegan Friendly! 

8:30 pm - How do *YOU* make Brussels better. Pitch your idea in 60 seconds or less!

Get your early bird ticket now for ‚Ç¨5 while they last (‚Ç¨10 at the door). We also have a limited number of free tickets for students and people with low income as we want to make sure we don't exclude anyone. Event is also free for the members of BrusselsTogether ([become a member](https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether/donate/10/monthly)).

**Why making this a paid event?**
If we really want this movement to succeed and to have an impact, we need to finance it, together.
We are a non profit and all our expenses are posted publicly on our [open collective](https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether).

Thank you for your support üôè

allEvents.name: BrusselsTogether Meetup 5
allEvents.description:
Hello Brussels üëã

We meet every first Wednesday of the month to talk about the Brussels development community.

![](https://cl.ly/3p013o452u3Y/Screen%20Shot%202017-05-17%20at%202.42.35%20PM.png)

Join us to discuss with MakeSense, Our House Project and many more change makers.

Schedule

7 pm - Doors open 

7:30 pm - #BrusselsTogether - On a mission to make Brussels a great city to live and work

7:40 pm - MakeSense - Turning your talents into unique superpowers to solve challenges of social entrepreneurs

7:55 pm - Our House Project - Enabling effective refugee integration

8:10 pm - Zero Waste X

8:30 pm - How do YOU make Brussels better 
Pitch your idea in 60 seconds or less

Thank you for your support :pray:
Get your early bird ticket now for ‚Ç¨5 while they last (‚Ç¨10 at the door). We also have a limited number of free tickets for students and people with low income as we want to make sure we don't exclude anyone. Event is also free for the members of BrusselsTogether ([become a member](https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether/donate/10/monthly)).

**Why making this a paid event?**
If we really want this movement to succeed and to have an impact, we need to finance it, together.
We are a non profit and all our expenses are posted publicly on our [open collective](https://qpayee.com/brusselstogether).

Thank you for your support üôè
